entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mississauga
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 6:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 56 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -8.6°C
Wind: NW 28 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to periods of rain or drizzle after midnight. Risk of freezing rain late in the evening and after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
